hero.subtitle: With over 20 years of experience, we connect tradition and innovation, bringing you premium raw materials and expert support for your success

after20.title: After 20 Years
after20.paragraph: We are a team of experienced professionals who are dedicated to providing the best possible service to our clients. We have been in the business for over 20 years and we are proud to say that we have a lot of satisfied customers.

blogs.title: Latest from Our Blog
blogs.blog1Title: The Importance of Quality Raw Materials
blogs.blog1Excerpt: Learn why quality raw materials are crucial for premium products and how they impact your business success.
blogs.blog2Excerpt: Discover our commitment to sustainable sourcing and how it benefits both the environment and your products.
blogs.blog3Excerpt: Stay ahead of the curve with our analysis of the latest trends in the raw materials industry.

founder.name: Luka Rakcevic
founder.quote: For over two decades, we've been committed to bringing the finest raw materials to our partners. Our success is built on three pillars: quality, sustainability, and trust. Every day, we strive to exceed expectations and maintain the highest standards in our industry.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are dedicated to providing the highest quality raw materials while maintaining sustainable practices and building long-lasting relationships with our partners.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Premium materials sourced from trusted suppliers

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from product quality to customer service.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to sustainable practices that protect our environment and future generations.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We build strong, lasting relationships with our partners based on trust and mutual success.

cta.title: Ready to Partner With Us?
cta.description: Join us in our mission to provide the highest quality raw materials while maintaining sustainable practices.

products.title: Our Premium Products
products.description: Discover our extensive range of high-quality raw materials, carefully sourced and processed to meet your specific needs.

items.name: Organic Herbs
items.description: Premium quality organic herbs sourced from sustainable farms.

items.name: Natural Extracts
items.description: Pure and potent natural extracts for various applications.

items.name: Essential Oils
items.description: High-grade essential oils extracted using traditional methods.

partners.title: Our Trusted Partners
partners.description: We work with industry leaders and innovative companies to deliver excellence in every project.

items.name: Global Herbs Ltd
items.description: Leading supplier of premium herbs and botanicals.

becomePartner.title: Become Our Partner
becomePartner.description: Join our network of trusted partners and grow your business with us.
